course.subject: ENVR
course.name: Sustainable Urban (City) Planning - Urban Responses to Climate Change
course.description: This course explores Sustainable Development of Hong Kong and Taipei. Different theories and cases (practices) would be taught by leading faculty experts and industry practitioners. It particularly looks at cities' mitigation and adaptation to climate changes with (potential) co-benefits leading to urban sustainable development. Students would travel to different cities and be immersed in local environment and culture. Site and company visitations further enrich the lecture materials and activities of the course of study. Approval from instructor is required for enrolling the course.
